data.message: My fb account has been locked ? I dont know why ?

replies.message: Pls facebook come back my facebook

Hi Khi. If your account is currently locked, you can try to get access by logging into your account and trying to complete the security check from the computer or mobile phone that you usually use to log into Facebook. Unfortunately, if you're unable to log in and complete the security check on your own, you'll have to send us an acceptable form of ID. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2mN7Uka. -Jessica
Can u do it for me. I give u my pass and email . Please help me jessica

My Facebook Always Locked , I Every create my new accout then After 1 Year . OMG. I dont know why ,, my Facebook always Locked after 1 year !
Please Give me a reason '' Why ??
